00057 class Condition : public Mutex {
00058   pthread_cond_t cond_;
00059  public:
00060   Condition() {
00061     if (pthread_cond_init(&cond_, NULL)) {
00062       fprintf(stderr, "Could not create lubyk::Condition\n");
00063     };
00064   }
00065 
00066   ~Condition() {
00067     if (pthread_cond_destroy(&cond_)) {
00068       fprintf(stderr, "Could not destroy lubyk::Condition\n");
00069     };
00070   }
00071 
00075   void wait() {
00076     if (pthread_cond_wait(&cond_, &mutex_)) {
00077       fprintf(stderr, "Could not call wait() on lubyk::Condition\n");
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00083   void signal() {
00084     // the lock/unlock ensures that signal is not called before wait()
00085     lock();
00086     unlock();
00087     if (pthread_cond_signal(&cond_)) {
00088       fprintf(stderr, "Could not call signal() on lubyk::Condition\n");
00089     }
00090   }
00091 };
00092 
00093 } // lubyk
